divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home from my mobile home park. I was driving my truck. I turn right on Steekee road. I notice a light that looked like a star. it was ahead of me to the left I keep looking at the star. then all of a sudden it started to come toward my truck. then the object stopped and hovered. The object was about 200 feet from my truck it looked the size of a basketball it was a yellow whites color. I almost stopped my truck. when the object was coming toward my truck. the object took off backward and disappeared . I did not see it again, after it took off backwards and disappeared behind the hill. it could not have been a star. a star don't do things like that here another one of my ufo sighting I thought i would share. you can believe or not believe its up to you
Summary: I was on my way home from my mobile home park a ball of light came toward my truck and stopped
